description: Arbitrary identifier for each unique address record.
Arbitrary person-level identifier. Used to link across tables.

value_description: PR = Patient-reported medical history HC = Healthcare problem list RG = Registry cohort PC = PCORnetdefined condition algorithm NI = No information UN = Unknown OT = Other
description: Arbitrary person-level identifier. Used to link across tables.

value_description: PO=Postal; PH=Physical; BO=Both; NI=No information; UN=Unknown; OT=Other;

description: Indicates whether this address is the preferred one for a given patient, address use and address type within a given address period.
Primary address line (e.g., street name and number)
Remaining address details (e.g., suite, post office box, other details)
The name of the county associated with the address.
The name of the city, town, village or other community.
State, as represented by 2-digit postal abbreviation.
Initial date when the address is known to be in use.
Date when address was no longer in use.
